attributes.action: Ban private "gender-affirming" medical treatment for children
attributes.background: To prevent "gender-affirming" medical treatment, such as prescriptions for puberty blockers/cross-sex hormones, being provided by private businesses, including online providers based abroad, to under-18s. We are concerned that in some cases private providers have behaved negligently.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care
